full_summary:
# 3D Measuring Laser Confocal Microscope Tender Announcement

**Reference Number:** WS3715607482
**Publication Date:** October 20, 2022
**Tender Closing Date:** November 7, 2022, 14:00:00
**Expect Contract Start Date:** March 31, 2023
**Expected Contract End Date:** March 31, 2024

## Background Information
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PWGSC) is issuing a tender announcement for the procurement of a 3D Measuring Laser Confocal Microscope for the National Research Council of Canada (NRC).

## Procurement Details
The tender is exclusively for suppliers with a contract to provide Laboratory and Scientific Equipment (UNSPSC 41100000). The procurement method involves an Advance Contract Award Notice, with an unsuccessful tendering reason of Exclusive Rights.

## Trade Agreements
This procurement is subject to Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), and Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement.

## Locations
The procurement is restricted to suppliers with a presence in Canada, specifically the National Capital Region (NCR).

## Contact Information
 Suppliers with questions or concerns regarding this tender should contact: Alexandra Lajoie, PSPC/SPAC at alexandra.lajoie@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

## Notice URL
The full tender announcement can be accessed at: <http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14422834?extsite=MTQ0MjI4MzRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>
